description: Numbers n such that n divides the (left) concatenation of all numbers <= n written in base 2 (most significant digit on right).
comments: This sequence differs from A029519 in that all least significant zeros are kept during concatenation.No more terms < 10^7. [Lars Blomberg, Aug 31 2011]
author: Larry Reeves (larryr(AT)acm.org), May 24 2001
extensions: Edited and updated by Larry Reeves (larryr(AT)acm.org), Apr 12 2002; Aug 25, 2002
